name: HBRKPageExpand
tagline: To Show all paginated to a page in HBR Korea
body:
### Welcome to HBRKPageExpandGitHub Pages.

If you want to see all pages of an article in one page when you're in HBR Korea?
Simply run the javascript or save it as a Bookmarklet to run it just one click.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
